The mantra that is unequaled by any other is the true word of the one who is alone revered in the three realms. It is able to remove all suffering, is true and not false. The bodhisattva, having given rise to the resolve, upholds, recites, and chants this perfection of wisdom.
It is able to sever birth, remove karmic hindrances, eliminate defilements, and give rise to right faith.
